name: decentralized-generative-content-platform
description: A blockchain-backed generative AI marketplace where users create and trade AI-generated digital assets with full on-chain provenance and token economics

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:contracts && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently --names "CONTRACTS,BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green" "npm run dev:contracts" "sleep 5 && npm run dev:backend" "sleep 8 && npm run dev:frontend"

author: Sourav Rajak <morningstarxcdcode>
